price: "Ey Malik! Rabbin işimizi bitirsin." diye haykırırlar. O da: "Siz, kalıcısınız!" der.
arabic: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi ʿalaynā rabbuka qāla innakum mākithūna
